Service Details: - Provides individuals with intellectual disabilities opportunities to enrich their lives and celebrate personal achievement through positive sport experiences- Gives athletes the chance to gain skills–in sports and in life–and improve their health while enjoying training that could take them to competitions at local, regional, national and international levels- Volunteer opportunities available
Eligibility: Ages: 2 year(s) and up- Program participants must have an intellectual disability and participants must be 8 years of age or older to take part in our core sport programs- Provides youth-specific programs for ages 2-6, 7-11 and 12-21.
